languages.text: Спустя полвека Простор содрогнулся, услышав эльдарские боевые песнопения. Несметные отряды, возникающие невесть откуда, истребляли всех на своем пути и скрывались во Вратах Паутины, умело спрятанных от глаз мон-кай. Дети Азуриана пришли мстить за гибель мира-корабля Крударах. Скорбное возмездие их вершилось много десятилетий, пока обе расы не оказались истощены и обескровлены.

Half a century later, the Expanse trembled to the echo of Aeldari war songs. Myriad warbands appeared out of nowhere, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake before disappearing into Webway Gates, masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of the craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.
languages.original_text: Спустя полвека Простор содрогнулся, услышав эльдарские боевые песнопения. Несметные отряды, возникающие невесть откуда, истребляли всех на своем пути и скрывались во Вратах Паутины, умело спрятанных от глаз мон-кай. Дети Азуриана пришли мстить за гибель мира-корабля Крударах. Скорбное возмездие их вершилось много десятилетий, пока обе расы не оказались истощены и обескровлены.

traits.locale_text: Half a century later, the Expanse trembled, hearing Aeldari war songs. Innumerable warbands, appeared seemingly from thin air, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake, and disappeared in Webway Gates, which were masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan came to avenge the death of Crudarach craftworld. Their woeful retribution lasted for many decades until both races became warworn and bloodless.

Half a century later, the Expanse trembled, hearing Aeldari war songs. Innumerable warbands, appeared seemingly from thin air, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake, and disappeared in Webway Gates, which were masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan came to avenge the death of Crudarach craftworld. Their woeful retribution lasted for many decades until both races became warworn and bloodless.

Half a century later, the Expanse trembled to the echo of Aeldari war songs. Myriad warbands appeared out of nowhere, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake before disappearing into Webway Gates, masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of Craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted for many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.

The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of Craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted for many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.

The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of the craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.

Half a century later, the Expanse trembled to the echo of Aeldari war songs. Myriad warbands appeared out of nowhere, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake before disappearing into Webway Gates, masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of the craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.

languages.text: 半个世纪后，艾达灵族的战歌声响彻科罗努斯扩区。无数战团从未知之处突然出现，一路杀戮，而后消失在网道大门中，巧妙地隐藏于猴子的视线之外。这些阿苏焉之子来到此地，为方舟世界克鲁达拉赫报仇。他们悲哀的复仇持续了数十年，直至人类与艾达灵族两败俱伤。
languages.original_text: Half a century later, the Expanse trembled to the echo of Aeldari war songs. Myriad warbands appeared out of nowhere, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake before disappearing into Webway Gates, masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of the craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.

traits.locale_text: 半个世纪后，艾达灵族的战歌声响彻科罗努斯扩区。无数战团从未知之处突然出现，一路杀戮，而后消失在网道大门中，巧妙地隐藏于猴子的视线之外。这些阿苏焉之子来到此地，为方舟世界克鲁达拉赫报仇。他们悲哀的复仇持续了数十年，直至人类与艾达灵族两败俱伤。

languages.text: Ein halbes Jahrhundert später erzitterte die Ausdehnung ob des Echos von Aeldari-Kriegsliedern. Unzählige Kriegsbanden tauchten aus dem Nichts auf, hinterließen eine Spur von Leichen und verschwanden wieder in Netzportale, meisterhaft vor den Augen von Chem-Pan-Sey verborgen. Die Kinder von Asuryan setzten an, den Tod des Weltenschiffs Crudarach zu rächen. Ihre gnadenlose Vergeltung dauerte viele Jahrzehnte, bis beide Spezies kriegsmüde waren und kein Blut mehr zu vergießen hatten.
languages.original_text: Half a century later, the Expanse trembled to the echo of Aeldari war songs. Myriad warbands appeared out of nowhere, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake before disappearing into Webway Gates, masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of the craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.

traits.locale_text: Ein halbes Jahrhundert später erzitterte die Ausdehnung ob des Echos von Aeldari-Kriegsliedern. Unzählige Kriegsbanden tauchten aus dem Nichts auf, hinterließen eine Spur von Leichen und verschwanden wieder in Netzportale, meisterhaft vor den Augen von Chem-Pan-Sey verborgen. Die Kinder von Asuryan setzten an, den Tod des Weltenschiffs Crudarach zu rächen. Ihre gnadenlose Vergeltung dauerte viele Jahrzehnte, bis beide Spezies kriegsmüde waren und kein Blut mehr zu vergießen hatten.

languages.text: Un demi-siècle plus tard, les Étendues tremblèrent en entendant résonner les chants de guerre aeldaris. Des myriades d'escouades apparurent soudainement, ne laissant derrière elles que des cadavres avant de disparaître dans des portails sur la Toile soigneusement dissimulés aux yeux des mon-keigh. C'est ainsi que les enfants d'Asuryan entreprirent de se venger de la destruction du vaisseau-monde Crudarach. Leurs assauts se succédèrent durant de nombreuses décennies, jusqu'à ce que les deux races cessent les combats, épuisées par la guerre.
languages.original_text: Half a century later, the Expanse trembled to the echo of Aeldari war songs. Myriad warbands appeared out of nowhere, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake before disappearing into Webway Gates, masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of the craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.

traits.locale_text: Un demi-siècle plus tard, les Étendues tremblèrent en entendant résonner les chants de guerre aeldaris. Des myriades d'escouades apparurent soudainement, ne laissant derrière elles que des cadavres avant de disparaître dans des portails sur la Toile soigneusement dissimulés aux yeux des mon-keigh. C'est ainsi que les enfants d'Asuryan entreprirent de se venger de la destruction du vaisseau-monde Crudarach. Leurs assauts se succédèrent durant de nombreuses décennies, jusqu'à ce que les deux races cessent les combats, épuisées par la guerre.

languages.text: Medio siglo más tarde, la Extensión temblaba ante el eco de las canciones de guerra Aeldari. Una miríada de partidas de guerra aparecieron de la nada, dejando un rastro de cadáveres antes de desaparecer por los Portales de la Telaraña, ocultados a la perfección de la mirada de los mon-keigh. Los Hijos de Asuryan acudieron a vengar la muerte del mundo astronave Crudarach. Su terrible contraataque se extendió durante décadas, hasta que ambas razas se quedaron sin fuerzas que invertir ni sangre que derramar en la lucha.
languages.original_text: Half a century later, the Expanse trembled to the echo of Aeldari war songs. Myriad warbands appeared out of nowhere, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake before disappearing into Webway Gates, masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of the craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.

traits.locale_text: Medio siglo más tarde, la Extensión temblaba ante el eco de las canciones de guerra Aeldari. Una miríada de partidas de guerra aparecieron de la nada, dejando un rastro de cadáveres antes de desaparecer por los Portales de la Telaraña, ocultados a la perfección de la mirada de los mon-keigh. Los Hijos de Asuryan acudieron a vengar la muerte del mundo astronave Crudarach. Su terrible contraataque se extendió durante décadas, hasta que ambas razas se quedaron sin fuerzas que invertir ni sangre que derramar en la lucha.

languages.text: 半世紀後、エクスパンスは鳴り響くアエルダリの軍歌に打ち震えた。 おびただしい軍勢がどこからともなく現れ、死体の轍を後に残したのちに、モン＝ケイの目を巧みに逃れながら、網辻門に姿を消していった。アシュリアンの御子たちは、今は亡き方舟クルダラの仇を討つために現れたのだ。彼らの嘆きの復讐劇は数十年に及び、双方の種族が戦いに傷つき流す血が尽きるまで続いた。
languages.original_text: Half a century later, the Expanse trembled to the echo of Aeldari war songs. Myriad warbands appeared out of nowhere, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake before disappearing into Webway Gates, masterfully hidden from the eyes of mon-keigh. The Children of Asuryan had come to avenge the death of the craftworld Crudarach. Their woeful retribution lasted many decades until both races were warworn and out of blood to spill.

traits.locale_text: 半世紀後、エクスパンスは鳴り響くアエルダリの軍歌に打ち震えた。 おびただしい軍勢がどこからともなく現れ、死体の轍を後に残したのちに、モン＝ケイの目を巧みに逃れながら、網辻門に姿を消していった。アシュリアンの御子たちは、今は亡き方舟クルダラの仇を討つために現れたのだ。彼らの嘆きの復讐劇は数十年に及び、双方の種族が戦いに傷つき流す血が尽きるまで続いた。

languages.text: Yarım yüzyıl sonra Enginlik, Aeldari savaş şarkılarının yankılarıyla titredi. Birdenbire ucu bucağı gözükmeyen savaş grupları ortaya çıkıyor, geçtikleri yerlerde sayısız ceset bırakıyor, ardından Ağyol Geçitlerine girerek mon-keighlerden ustalıkla gizleniyorlardı. Asuryan'ın Çocukları, Crudarach gemidünyasının ölümünün intikamını almak için gelmişti. Misilleme saldırısı on yıllar boyunca sürdü. Ta ki her iki ırkın da savaşacak mecali ve dökecek kanı kalmayana kadar.

Ta ki her iki ırkın da savaşacak mecali ve dökecek kanı kalmayana kadar.
